Be REady, It's time to get some answers "

ject: Re: Into the Darkness [Arrivng at the Jungle]

> Upon hearing about=
 Yoketron, Straight Shot freezes. Her expressions change dramatically, as s=
he turns to Leo Prime.
> 
> " Dinobot - knew all that time, that Master Yok=
etron was killed? Why didn't anyone tell us? Does anyone else know? Has any=
one even told Nightshift and Tucson? I'd like ta see Dinobot gather the cou=
rage ta tell Tucson in person what his comrade did ta our Sensai! "
> 
> Qu=
ickstride turns to Dinobot in shock.
> 
> " I know you preds are bad news, =
but wow, that really tips the scales, literally."
> 
> Rattrap also gasps.
=
> 
> " AND YOU THOUGHT WHAT I DID WAS BAD?! HAH, THAT WAS JUST PAYBACK FOR =
WHAT YOUR COMRADE DID TA THE GREATEST NINJABOT MASTER OF ALL TIME! IF I HAD=
 KNOWN THAT I WOULD NEVER HAVE ADMITTED TA MY MISTAKE! OHHH ARE YOU IN SERI=
OUS SCRAP NOW BUDDY! JUST WAIT UNTIL TUCSON IS NOTIFIED OF THIS! Then again=
... Ohh boy, Leo, I - think you better be the one ta tell 'em... Master Yok=
etron was everything ta him, this is gonna really do serious damage ta his =
emotional circuitry."
>

smirking, "Why, is taht not your own soldiers upon your orders who

e continuosly harrassing us now? Truly, I expected some semblance of
> > > =
dignity, at least from the Rodent. Him I expected to have a smidgen of
> > =
> awareness of the crisis. But, if he is quite happy to mock us when you ha=
ve
> > > called us, then I doubt there is any crisis at all if he's quite h=
appy to
> > > instigate a fight and back up those who do. You wish to coope=
rate, keep
> > > your own force sin line."
> >

d facing DINOBOT, his face serious his own anger obvious in

optics, but held at bay by the force of his will.
> > "Maximals, stand down=
." he said again. He looked at DINOBOT, "You will
> > keep your troops in l=
ine as well." He glanced up as the other
> > Predacons were moving in. He g=
lanced over at HYDRAS, wondering when or
> > even if the PREDACON leader wo=
uld do anything about his troops.
> > 
> > "With me." LEO said with a drama=
tic flare worthy of a PRIME. He turned
> > and walked back towards the cent=
er of the clearing where they had
> > originally been having the discussion=
 with HYDRAS, perhaps distance
> > would allow things to simmer down.
> > 
=

> =

enough to get to TUSCON. At least so long as HYDRAS refused to keep
